name: Choice (itch) (kartikey0303)
description:
It is a text adventure type game. It seems like a generic adventure game but there are hidden choices (maybe hidden in the dialogue). The default choices don't  always result in a good ending.

The protagonist of the story is a new hero who has just joined and is looking to make the world a better place. But the encounters in the world are not what he expected. Everything is twisted. The choices always lie. The game always lie. It is the player's job to figure out the right path.
